      • processDirectory

        public static boolean processDirectory(Path inputDir,
                                       FileParser.Type fileParserType,
                                       boolean enableOcr,
                                       List<NlpStage> nlpStages,
                                       List<NamedEntity.Category> nlpTargetEntities,
                                       List<NlpPipeline.Type> nlpPipelineTypes,
                                       int nlpPipelineParallelism,
                                       boolean nlpPipelineCaching,
                                       Indexer indexer,
                                       String index)
        /** Extract Documents and NamedEntitys from files under inputDir Store them into index Coordinating Tasks with local in-memory BlockingQueues, - Scan files from inputDir - Parse each file Path into a Document - Index each Document to index using indexerType Indexer - Extract all NamedEntitys from each Document using nlpPipelineTypes NlpPipelines - Index each NamedEntity to index using indexerType Indexer
        Parameters:
        inputDir - the directory source files are scanned from
        fileParserType - the FileParser.Type to instantiate
        enableOcr - the flag for activating OCR at file parsing time
        nlpStages - the targeted NLP processing stages
        nlpTargetEntities - the targeted named entity categories
        nlpPipelineTypes - the NlpPipeline.Type to instantiate
        nlpPipelineParallelism - the number of threads per nlpPipelineType
        nlpPipelineCaching - the flag for caching models while running NlpPipelines
        indexer - the indexer instance
        index - the destination index
        Returns:
        true if processings terminated successfully; false otherwise

      • awaitIndexIsUp
